name: Beperk.com
tag_list: ecommerce, collective-commerce, long-tail, offers, needs, services, reputation, tickets, digital-goods, digital-files
overview:
Beperk is a marketplace to buy and sell original services on Internet.

A common place to offer your services or request services for your needs.

If you offer something for a fixed price: You can sell services like digital files, online work, offline work, consulting services by phone and much more.

If you need something for some money: You can request people to help you with a furniture restoration, a party catering, hire a gardener…

You can generate your PDF as tickets for a concert, add galleries, videos, maps, save your reputation, talk with your customers or sellers, use a promotion panel to offer your services and install the Beperk Facebook App in your Facebook Page to convert your fans in customers.

Beperk offer two payments system, a direct payment for services and a scrow payment system for needs.

Beperk is designed for a cool personalized experience, you can change backgrounds and add all type of media so people can be proud with their services and pages.
